alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 5:14PM CDT until May 12 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jewell County in north central Kansas... Southern Nuckolls County in south central Nebraska... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 514 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Nelson to 6 miles northeast of Mankato to near Glen Elder, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Nelson, Nora and Lovewell State Park around 520 PM CDT. Webber around 525 PM CDT. Superior around 530 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Hardy, Formoso and Ruskin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
